```{r setup, include=FALSE}

# SMM
#-------------
# smm=read_excel("E:/documents/ehr-database/documents/datadictionary/oneflorida/PregnancyOutcomes_variables_20231031.xlsx", sheet = "SMM")

smm=read_excel(paste0(working_dir,"/documents/datadictionary/oneflorida/PregnancyOutcomes_variables_20231031.xlsx"), sheet = "SMM") %>%
  rename(icd_decimal=Code) %>%
  mutate(icd_short= gsub("\\.", "",icd_decimal)) %>%
  select(icd_decimal,icd_short)


condition=read_excel(paste0(working_dir,"/documents/datadictionary/oneflorida/PregnancyOutcomes_variables_20231031.xlsx"), sheet = "Category_condition") %>%
  rename(icd_decimal=Code) %>%
  mutate(icd_short= gsub("\\.", "",icd_decimal)) %>%
  select(icd_decimal,icd_short)

# unique smm-codes from data-dictionary
smm_codes_unique=unique(smm$icd_short)
length(smm_codes_unique)                    # 622

# unique condition-codes from data-dictionary
condition_codes_unique=unique(condition$icd_short)
length(condition_codes_unique)                       # 1458


# how many codes intersection?
length(intersect(smm_codes_unique,condition_codes_unique))  # 108 intersect

# combine smm and conditions
smm_conditions=rbind(smm,condition)

# Create a distinct export dataset with relevant columns
export <- smm_conditions %>%
  distinct()

# Define output directory and file paths
output_directory <- file.path(working_dir, "data", "processed")
csv_file <- file.path(output_directory, "smm_codes_oneflorida.csv")
rda_file <- file.path(output_directory, "smm_codes_oneflorida.RData")

# Ensure the output directory exists
if (!dir.exists(output_directory)) {
  dir.create(output_directory, recursive = TRUE)
}

# Save export dataset to CSV and RData files
write.csv(export, csv_file, row.names = FALSE)
save(export, file = rda_file)

# Print success message
message("Exported data successfully to:\n", csv_file, "\n", rda_file)

```
